TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpUtility extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供處理 Web 要求時用於編碼和解碼 URL 的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會在內部使用類別，其方法和屬性會公開透過內建 ASP.NET物件。The class is used internally by the class, whose methods and properties are exposed through the intrinsic ASP.NET object. 此外，類別包含的編碼和解碼公用程式方法，從。Additionally, the class contains encoding and decoding utility methods that are not accessible from the . 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the , and methods of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/cs/httputilityexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/vb/httputilityexample.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HttpUtility();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會公開的方法來編碼和解碼的字串基礎的 Url，URL 語彙基元和路徑。The class exposes methods for encoding and decoding string based URLs, URL tokens, and paths. 會在內部使用類別。The is used internally by the class.

summary.span: 以最低限度將字串轉換成 HTML 編碼字串。

span.span: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string.

span.span: The string to encode.

summary.span: 最低限度將字串轉換成 HTML 編碼字串。

span.span: Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於 HTML 屬性值插入的字元編碼。The method encodes characters appropriate for insertion into an HTML attribute value. 從字串結果方法應該只用於雙引號括住的屬性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用時，可能會引發安全性問題方法具有單一加上引號的屬性。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void HtmlAttributeEncode (string s, System.IO.TextWriter output);
.method public static hidebysig void HtmlAttributeEncode(string s, class System.IO.TextWriter output) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HtmlAttributeEncode (s As String, output As TextWriter)
public: static void HtmlAttributeEncode(System::String ^ s, System::IO::TextWriter ^ output);

span.span: The string to encode
A output stream.

summary.span: 以最簡化的方式將字串轉換為 HTML 編碼的字串，並將編碼的字串傳送至 輸出資料流。

span.span: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將轉換只引號 （"）、 連字號 (&) 及左角括弧 (<) 為對等的字元實體。The method converts only quotation marks ("), ampersands (&), and left angle brackets (<) to equivalent character entities. 它是比 new-object 快得方法。It is considerably faster than the method. 從字串結果方法應該只用於雙引號括住的屬性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用時，可能會引發安全性問題方法具有單一加上引號的屬性。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

summary.span: 將 HTTP 傳輸的 HTTP 編碼字串轉換成已解碼的字串。

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

summary.span: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。

span.span: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string HtmlDecode (string s);
.method public static hidebysig string HtmlDecode(string s) cil managed
Public Shared Function HtmlDecode (s As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ HtmlDecode(System::String ^ s);

span.span: The string to decode.

summary.span: 將 HTTP 傳輸的 HTTP 編碼字串轉換成已解碼的字串。

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.
A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. HTML 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 HTML 中的字元轉換HTML 解碼反轉的編碼方式。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在一段文字，字元\<和 > 會編碼為<和>HTTP 傳輸。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as < and > for HTTP transmission. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the and methods of the class. 使用編碼的輸入的字串方法。The input string is encoded using the method. 編碼的字串取得然後解碼使用方法。The encoded string obtained is then decoded using the method. [!code-csharp[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/CS/httputility_htmldecode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/VB/httputility_htmldecode.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void HtmlDecode (string s, System.IO.TextWriter output);
.method public static hidebysig void HtmlDecode(string s, class System.IO.TextWriter output) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HtmlDecode (s As String, output As TextWriter)
public: static void HtmlDecode(System::String ^ s, System::IO::TextWriter ^ output);

span.span: The string to decode.
A stream of output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. HTML 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 HTML 中的字元轉換HTML 解碼反轉的編碼方式。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在一段文字，字元\<和 > 會編碼為<和>HTTP 傳輸。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as < and > for HTTP transmission. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. HTML 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 HTML 中的字元轉換HTML 解碼反轉的編碼方式。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在一段文字，字元\<和 >，會編碼為<和>HTTP 傳輸。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and >, are encoded as < and > for HTTP transmission. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

summary.span: 編碼字串。

span.span: Encodes a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將編碼的字串。This method encodes strings. 比方說，單引號和雙引號將納入作為`\'`和`\"`中編碼的字串。For instance, single quotation marks and double quotation marks are included as `\'` and `\"` in the encoded string. URL 編碼方式可確保所有瀏覽器會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。URL encoding makes sure that all browsers correctly transmit text in URL strings. 例如問號 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線 （/） 和空格字元可能會截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，這些字元必須編碼在`a`項目或查詢字串的字串可以所要求之字串中的瀏覽器重新傳送。Therefore, these characters must be encoded in `a` elements or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.

summary.span: 使用 編碼，將查詢字串剖析為 。

span.span: Parses a query string into a using encoding.

returns.span: 由查詢參數和值所組成的 。

span.span: A of query parameters and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用格式來剖析查詢字串中傳回、 解碼 URL 編碼的字元和多個項目相同的查詢字串參數的以逗號分隔每個列示為單一項目值。The method uses format to parse the query string In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用查詢字串，其中可能包含使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 相同的查詢字串變數的多個項目將會傳回一個項目中合併。Multiple occurrences of the same query string variable are consolidated in one entry of the returned . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/cs/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/vb/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在傳回、 解碼 URL 編碼的字元和多個項目相同的查詢字串參數的以逗號分隔每個值列示為單一項目。In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用查詢字串，其中可能包含使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在要傳輸的 url，字元的文字區塊\<和 > 會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

summary.span: 使用指定的編碼物件，將 URL 編碼的位元組陣列轉換成已解碼的字串，起點在陣列中的指定位置，延續至指定的位元組數目。

span.span: Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified encoding object, starting at the specified position in the array, and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在 URL 中傳送至文字區塊字元\<和 > 會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

span.span: is , but does not equal .

exception.span: 小於 或大於 陣列的長度。

span.span: is less than or greater than the length of the array.
\- or -

exception.span: 小於 ，或 + 大於 陣列的長度。

span.span: is less than , or + is greater than the length of the array.

URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在要傳輸的 url，字元的文字區塊\<和 > 會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用來編碼整個 URL，包括查詢字串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當字元\<和 > 內嵌在 URL 中傳送至文字區塊中，會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

.method public static hidebysig string UrlEncode(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function UrlEncode (str As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ UrlEncode(System::String ^ str);

span.span: The text to encode.

summary.span: 將 URL 字串編碼。

span.span: Encodes a URL string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用來編碼整個 URL，包括查詢字串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果字元，例如空白與標點符號會直接傳遞到 HTTP 資料流的編碼方式，可能會被誤解它們在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream without encoding, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當字元\<和 > 內嵌在 URL 中傳送至文字區塊中，會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 您可以編碼使用的 URL方法或方法。You can encode a URL using with the method or the method. 不過，方法會傳回不同的結果。However, the methods return different results. 方法會將每個空格字元轉換成加號字元 （+）。The method converts each space character to a plus character (+). 方法會將每個空格字元到字串"%20"，代表空格的十六進位表示法轉換。The method converts each space character into the string "%20", which represents a space in hexadecimal notation. 使用方法才能保證一致已解碼的 URL，不論哪一個平台或瀏覽器編碼 URL 的路徑部分時，會執行 「 解碼。Use the method when you encode the path portion of a URL in order to guarantee a consistent decoded URL, regardless of which platform or browser performs the decoding. 方法會使用 utf-8 編碼預設。The method uses UTF-8 encoding by default. 因此，使用方法會提供與使用相同的結果方法並指定做為第二個參數。Therefore, using the method provides the same results as using the method and specifying as the second parameter. 是方便的方式來存取方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。 is a convenient way to access the method at run time from an ASP.NET application. 就內部而言，使用編碼字串的方法。Internally, uses the method to encode strings. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

The number of bytes to encode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用來編碼整個 URL，包括查詢字串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼，將對等的字元實體; 不允許在 URL 中的字元轉換URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當字元\<和 > 內嵌在 URL 中傳送至文字區塊中，會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 類別。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

span.span: A Unicode string in % notation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼轉換的 url 以對等的字元實體; 無效的字元URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在要傳輸的 url，字元的文字區塊\<和 > 會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] UrlEncodeUnicodeToBytes (string str);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] UrlEncodeUnicodeToBytes(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function UrlEncodeUnicodeToBytes (str As String) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ UrlEncodeUnicodeToBytes(System::String ^ str);

span.span: The string to convert.

summary.span: 將 Unicode 字串轉換成位元組陣列。

span.span: Converts a Unicode string into an array of bytes.
A byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果例如空白與標點符號的字元傳遞到 HTTP 資料流，它們可能會誤譯在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 編碼轉換的 url 以對等的字元實體; 無效的字元URL 解碼反轉的編碼方式。URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，當內嵌在要傳輸的 url，字元的文字區塊\<和 > 會編碼為 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.
